How many control knobs does a good distortion guitar effect pedal really need? EarthQuaker Devices’s answer is “one.” The Acapulco Gold V2 may only have one giant dial, but it lets you access a whole gamut of distortion tones based on a cranked-up Sunn Model T amp.

April 14, 2025 - EarthQuaker Devices is an effects pedal manufacturer located in Akron, Ohio that was founded by Jamie Stillman and Julie Robbins in 2004. EarthQuaker is part of the boutique guitar pedal industry. The brand is known for their high-quality effect pedals and their intricate visuals.
